ModMetaData.name: Crafting Quality Rebalanced
ModMetaData.author: Phomor
ModMetaData.description: Rebalances Item Crafting Quality, for example a skill 20 Crafter won't have the chance to make an awful item anymore. Skill Minimal Quality 7 Poor 9 Normal 13 Good Now with adjustable thresholds and a setting for every quality threshold too.
